snippet: An excerpt from “Surface Tension,” a minimalist video by Hollis Frampton, consists of “a single dolly shot from the middle of the Brooklyn Bridge to the lake in Central Park.”
abstract: An excerpt from “Surface Tension,” a minimalist video by Hollis Frampton, consists of “a single dolly shot from the middle of the Brooklyn Bridge to the lake in Central Park.”

headline.main: Strolling Through 1968 New York, in 160 Seconds
